page.title: 02Western Suburbs
page.content: The Pear Tree Estate First of all we went round Pear Tree Estate.At the moment there are a lot of changes;first of all the houses have changed from plaster_based to solid brick ones.Before the houses were built there was just grassland.They never planted crops because the ground was too rocky.The houses are eighteen years old.On Highfield Avenue they are moving people into caravans while rebuilding their houses.Jasmin Close and Fern Close are going to be knocked down and then they will plant trees.When we had investigated our area we went back to school.
